system.description: Effect: All valid targets become Bound 4. While Bound, they take a Tick of HP in damage at the end of each of their activations. Whirlpool's Power is doubled against Swimming targets.

actions.name: Whirlpool
actions.description: Effect: All valid targets become Bound 4. While Bound, they take a Tick of HP in damage at the end of each of their activations. Whirlpool's Power is doubled against Swimming targets.
